short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate selected text to specific language with Google Translator official page oppened in new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click over selected text and this extension will open Google Translator in new tab, selected text language will be auto-detected and translated to a specific language. Default language can be chosen in Right Click Google Translator context menu.
